app_descript:
App name: Videoleap by Lightricks. Official Android release!

Brief: Videoleap by Lightricks is a dynamic, user-friendly video editor designed for both novices and professionals alike, making the art of video creation accessible and fun. With this powerful tool at your fingertips, crafting Hollywood-level films or engaging social media content is not only possible but effortless.

  • üéµ Sound Mastery: Control audio with fade, volume, and speed adjustments. üìå
